articles.title: Americans remember George Floyd on fifth anniversary of his death - BBC
articles.description: As the cities where Floyd grew up and died hold commemorations,  the US "reckoning" with racism seems to be fading.
articles.content:
Floyd was remembered in Houston, where he grew up, and Minneapolis, where he was killed
